If you're up for a bit of mystery as well, "The Secret" might also intrigue you. With Genevieve O'Reilly and James Nesbitt in the lead roles, this film explores themes of truth, lies, and secrets that will keep you guessing until the very end!

Maid in Manhattan (2002), on the other hand, offers a different experience with stars like Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, and Bob Hoskins. This romantic comedy provides a light-hearted twist to the usual war movies, offering a delightful change of pace.

If you fancy something more modern, "Date Night" might be a great choice too. Although not in Tswana, it stars stars Steve Carell and Tina Fey, known for their comedy skills, and the plot involves a case of mistaken identity leading to an exciting and thrilling evening. Enjoy!

If you're looking for something different, there's also 'Passion', a short documentary about Jack Passion, a two-time world beard champion, which is narrated in English but offers a unique perspective on the world of competitive beard growing.
